ABOUT ME

Professional Profile

Who I Am

I'm a 22-year-old fresh graduate with a Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering (weak current stream) from Universitas Wijayakusuma Purwokerto. My passion lies in industrial instrumentation, IoT technologies, and automation systems.

With over one year of experience as a technician in IT infrastructure companies and participation in projects at PT Pertamina International RU IV Cilacap, I've developed strong technical skills in instrumentation, PLC programming, and electrical systems.

I'm also experienced as a laboratory assistant at UNWIKU's Electrical Engineering laboratory, where I taught subjects like Digital Techniques, Basic Programming, PLC, SCADA, and IoT.
